component.name: LoadingIndicator
component.script:
Sub init() m.spinner = m.top.findNode("spinner")
m.spinner.poster.uri="pkg:/images/loader.gif" m.spinner.poster.width="75" m.spinner.poster.height="75" m.spinner.visible = "true" m.spinner.control = "start"
centerMarkupBox()
End Sub
Sub centerMarkupBox() 'Center the MarkUp Box spinnerRect = m.spinner.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - spinnerRect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - spinnerRect.height) / 2
m.spinner.translation = [ centerx, centery ] End Sub
